edu.ohiou.labimp.gtk3d
Class Polygon3d

java.lang.Object
  edu.ohiou.labimp.basis.ViewObject
      edu.ohiou.labimp.draw.ImpObject
          edu.ohiou.labimp.gtk3d.Polygon3d
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable2D, Viewable, Drawable3D, DrawableWF, java.io.Serializable
public class Polygon3d
extends ImpObject

Class to represent bounded surfaces of a geometrical entity. For example: stock faces, cutting surface generated while machining

See Also:
Serialized Form

pointInPolygon2D

private boolean pointInPolygon2D(double[] xp,
                                 double[] yp,
                                 double x,
                                 double y)
This method will return TRUE if the point (x,y) is inside the polygon, or FALSE if it is not. If the point (x,y) is exactly on the edge of the polygon, then the "modified" method returns TRUE. (Source: Determining Whether A Point Is Inside A Complex Polygon Author: Darel R. Finley URL: http://www.alienryderflex.com/polygon/ NOTE: Division by zero is avoided because the division is protected by the "if" clause which surrounds it. The method "pointOnBoundary" is used to determine if point (x,y) lies on the boundary of polygon.

Parameters:
xp[] - Horizontal coordinates of vertices of polygon.
yp[] - Vertical coordinates of vertices of polygon.
x - Horizontal coordinate of test point.
y - Vertical coordinate of test point.
Returns:
TRUE/FALSE Test point inside/outside of polygon.

isPointInsidePolygon3d

public boolean isPointInsidePolygon3d(javax.vecmath.Point3d testPoint)
Method to check a point lies inside or outside given Polygon3d. Returns true if the point lies inside the given Polygon3d and false if the point lies outside the given Polygon3d.
